title: Song Schema
description: The Song Archetype - Essential properties that define a song

_id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

primary_audio_archetype.description: Audio Archetype ID to use as the audio file of the song

cover_image.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the cover image of this song

category.description: General category of the song, e.g. EDM

subcategory.description: Specific category of the song, e.g. Trance

publish_date.description: Date and time of publication in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record
